segments.text: That little boy is standing on a stool that looks like it’s about to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He’s reaching for cookies, but he’s going to fall if he’s not careful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His sister is just standing there, waiting for a cookie like it’s no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe they’re doing this right behind their mother’s back.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool legs are splayed out, and it’s clearly unstable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, he could really hurt himself on those cabinet edges.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would stop him before it’s too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl doesn’t seem to care about the danger at all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She’s just focused on getting a cookie, not the fact that her brother might fall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope their mom turns around soon and sees what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
